name: Fashion Fever 2 - Top Models and Looks Styling
name_original: Fashion Fever 2 - Top Models and Looks Styling
description:
Become a star of the runways and unleash your style in Fashion Fever 2! Showcase your fashion and styling skills by putting together the best looks for beautiful top models.

Explore the hottest and trendiest fashion brands and choose the right outfits for every event or occasion. Take part in glamourous contests and become world famous!

Pick a classic summer look for the fashion magazine photo shoot, and a sexy alternative look for the club. As your career takes off, gain access to the best and most exclusive clothes as you make your way to stardom!

Play exciting puzzle matching games to earn more cash and invest in your career!

HIGHLIGHTS
• MANAGE the career of up to 8 super models simultaneously
• GO SHOPPING and CUSTOMIZE the looks with hundreds of options of clothes and accessories
• DRESS FOR THE JOB: put together incredible looks from 30 exclusive fashion brands
• STYLE the perfect outfit for every occasion and become the one everyone talks about
• FUN MINIGAMES to earn extra cash

Fashion Fever 2 is the definitive game for fashion lovers. Are you ready to live the runway life?

Disclaimer: While this App is completely free to play, some additional content can be purchased for real money in-game. If you do not want to use this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.
